word_group.brief_definition: 正当关切；合理关切；合理关注
正当业务；合法经营；正当生意
合法经营的剧院；正当的剧院

bilingual.source: The company has a legitimate business license.
bilingual.target: 这家公司有一个合法的营业执照。

bilingual.source: The lawyer argued that the contract was legitimate.
bilingual.target: 律师辩称合同是合法的。

bilingual.source: The government aims to create a legitimate framework for trade.
bilingual.target: 政府旨在创建一个合法的贸易框架。

bilingual.source: It is important to ensure that all transactions are legitimate.
bilingual.target: 确保所有交易都是合法的是很重要的。

bilingual.source: Physiognomy was once considered a legitimate science in ancient times.
bilingual.target: 面相学曾经在古代被认为是一门合法的科学。

bilingual.source: Ask their children to use legitimate medicines.
bilingual.target: 要求他们的孩子使用合法的药物。

bilingual.source: The law says this is quite legitimate .
bilingual.target: 从法律上说，这是合法的。

bilingual.source: Legitimate and only son of great Caesar!
bilingual.target: 则是凯撒大帝唯一和合法的儿子！
从法律上说，这是合法的。

bilingual.source: The legitimate heir; the true and lawful king.
bilingual.target: 合法后嗣；真实而合法的君主。

yingyinNormal.en: So, appreciating the government's legitimate national security concerns, I'm gonna find that the NSA's gag order should remain in place.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，鉴于政府合法的出于国家安全的顾虑，我决定，维持国家安全局的言论禁止令。

yingyinNormal.en: However, appreciating the legitimate free enterprise concerns of Mr. Gross, I also find that Chumhum has been damaged in the amount of $14,000.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是考虑到格罗斯先生合法的企业经营自由，我判决认定查查网的损失金额为1.4万美元。

yingyinNormal.en: He's really good at getting in and out of places without being seen and leaving nothing but a body count in his wake. He's a legitimate English badass.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他非常擅长于出入各种地方，无声无息，除了留下个死尸以外，不会留下任何蛛丝马迹，他是个合法的英国混蛋。
大家都是那样子学脚踏车的，哇。

yingyinNormal.en: We are going to have a legitimate member of the clergy. And when I say legitimate, I mean, gay and in control of his saliva.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要一位真正的牧师，我是说正式的，我指的是同性恋，而且能控制口水的。

yingyinNormal.en: Ask me a legitimate question and I will give you a direct answer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 向我提出合理的问题，我会直接给你们答案。

yingyinNormal.en: He's right. Take out all legitimate personnel. Anyone that remains is a terrorist.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说得对，调走所有的合法公务人员，剩下的就都是那些恐怖分子了。

yingyinNormal.en: How am I supposed to run for office at some point if I don't have a legitimate track record?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我没有令人信服的资历，日后我怎么选总统。

yingyinNormal.en: The defense must show that the bail money is legitimate and does not come from drug proceeds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 辩方必须证明保释金合法，不是贩毒收益。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay anyway, if you're going to want to make a baby kinda eye shade, and here's a legitimate question for you all.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好啦，如果你想有个婴儿般的眼影的话，哦，我有一个合理的问题要问大家。

yingyinNormal.en: No, you taught me to navigate people's minds. But after what happened there weren't a whole lot of legitimate ways for me to use that skill.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你教我操纵人的意识，之后呢? 现在这种手法却被认为不合法。

yingyinNormal.en: If you have a legitimate request, you can submit it to me in writing, and I'll evaluate it based on its merits. Sure, sure. Is "jet ski" one word or two?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你们有合理正当的需求，你们可以写一份报告给我，我会根据利弊来评估。行行行，请问水上摩托的"摩"字怎么写？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adj. 合法的；合乎规矩的；正当的；合乎逻辑的；有合法王位继承权的；正剧的

examination_example.sentence: As Nature has pointed out before, there are some <highlight>legitimate</highlight> concerns about how science prizes — both new and old — are distributed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如《自然》杂志之前指出的那样，对于科学奖项的分配——无论是新奖项还是旧奖项——存在一些合理的担忧。
国家在移民执法中的合法作用。

examination_example.sentence: In effect, the White House claimed that it could invalidate any otherwise <highlight>legitimate</highlight> state law that it disagrees with.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实际上，白宫声称，如果它不同意，它可以废除任何合法的州法律。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Recreating a deceased famous actor or actress may violate their <highlight>legitimate</highlight> rights.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 重新塑造已故的著名演员可能会侵犯他们的合法权利。

examination_example.sentence: Ask their children to use <highlight>legitimate</highlight> medicines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要求他们的孩子使用合法的药物。

examination_example.sentence: Experts believe there is a relationship between adult abuse of <highlight>legitimate</highlight> medicines and the drug culture that has swept our country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 专家认为，成年人滥用合法药物与席卷我国的毒品文化之间存在联系。

examination_example.sentence: I think this is a very <highlight>legitimate</highlight> concern, and I appreciate their drawing our attention to it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为这是一个非常合理的关切，我感谢他们提请我们注意这一点。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
